Comment 2: 
That's true.  Gotest etc make simplifying assumptions.
It works best if your code satisfies the assumptions, and
one of them is that the tests (and in fact the package sources)
are all in the same directory.  In exchange for this, you don't
have to list the tests explicitly, and I hope eventually you won't
even have to write a Makefile at all.
